channel.title: Gravity Falls on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Gravity Falls on Game6r

item.title: Disney XD: Oddventure Land
item.description: The game Gravity Falls sends the gamer to a small town in the US state of Oregon. It is there that you will meet two little adventurers - the twins Dipper and Mabel Pable. Having gone to stay with their uncle, they find themselves in the wonderful world of the supernatural. Despite the dangers that await them at every turn, the guys decide to take a walk along the Streets of Gravity Falls to explore all the anomalies of this amazing place.

item.title: Gravity Falls game - Stanmobile escape
item.description: Representatives of one of the secret state organizations decided to arrest the head of the Order of the Closed Eye, Stanley Pines. Help Uncle Sam get away from his pursuers in an old but rather powerful car. Try to avoid collisions with obstacles and collect the maximum number of Emblems of the Closed Eye.
